name: Jayang-2-gyo
description:
Technically in a restricted area, Sangtubawigol is one of the most regularly climbed streams in Seoraksan National Park. Blogged about and instagrammed frequently. Most people go up the valley, rather than down - so bolts are set up for the easiest climbs rather than the best rappels. Avoid this canyon during periods of heavy rain or high winds - rockfall a serious danger.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites
